entry.title: LuisAlberto08/simple-portfolio-api: A lightweight Express.js API that serves portfolio data including personal bio and project information. Designed with modular routing for scalability and ease of integration.
entry.content: A lightweight Express.js API that serves portfolio data including personal bio and project information. Designed with modular routing for scalability and ease of integration.

entry.title: khyatish14/bottom-sheet-stepper: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.
entry.content: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

entry.title: sergiomrebelo/P4M1-Ollama-Chatbot-Server-Example: This repository provides a lightweight Node.js server and web interface for interacting with local LLMs via Ollama. Built with Express, it includes API endpoints for sending messages, listing models, and managing chat history
entry.content: This repository provides a lightweight Node.js server and web interface for interacting with local LLMs via Ollama. Built with Express, it includes API endpoints for sending messages, listing models, and managing chat history

entry.title: hany226/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.
entry.content: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

entry.title: JaCraig/Woodchuck: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
entry.content: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.

entry.title: ajstyle4u/DivCopy: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.
entry.content: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

entry.title: googleapis/gaxios: An HTTP request client that provides an axios like interface over top of node-fetch. Super lightweight. Supports proxies and all sorts of other stuff.
entry.content: An HTTP request client that provides an axios like interface over top of node-fetch. Super lightweight. Supports proxies and all sorts of other stuff.

entry.title: harpia-framework/core: Harpia Core is the foundational module of the Harpia Framework, designed exclusively for the Bun runtime. Like Express, Fastify, or Hono, it can be used independently, offering a lightweight yet powerful foundation for building modern web applications optimized for Bun.
entry.content: Harpia Core is the foundational module of the Harpia Framework, designed exclusively for the Bun runtime. Like Express, Fastify, or Hono, it can be used independently, offering a lightweight yet powerful foundation for building modern web applications optimized for Bun.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
